attributes.additional_details: Since the dawn of mankind our civilization has gazed upon the heavens and has been inspired us. That inspiration has created some of the best scientists such as Aristotle, Archimedes, Erwin Schrödinger, Galileo Galilei, Isaac Newton, Johannes Kepler, Marie Skłodowska-Curie, Albert Einstein, Stephen Hawkings and many others. Seeing the sky in its ultimate form is one of the most breath taking sites and should not be deprived from others seeing this sight. I want the government to prevent the disappearance of the Milky way galaxy from the British countryside and to preserve it.
